{"id":1088029921,"question_id":583,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1698722465,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1088029921/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        int m = word1.length();\n        int n = word2.length();\n\n        int[][] dp = new int[m+1][n+1];\n\n        for(int i=0; i<=m; i++){ // 有幾個char 就要幾個operation\n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        }\n\n        for(int j=0; j<=n; j++){\n            dp[0][j]= j;\n        }\n\n        for(int i=1; i<=m; i++){\n            for(int j=1; j<=n; j++){\n\n                if(word1.charAt(i-1)==word2.charAt(j-1)){\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n\n                }else{\n                    int up = dp[i-1][j];\n                    int left = dp[i][j-1];\n\n                    dp[i][j] = 1+ Math.min(up, left);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[m][n];\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
